original_text: Now the betrayer had given them a sign, saying, “The one I will kiss is the man. Seize him and lead him away under guard.”
korean_text: 예수를 파는 자가 이미 그들과 군호를 짜 이르되 내가 입맞추는 자가 그이니 그를 잡아 단단히 끌어 가라 하였는지라

sentences.original_text: Now the betrayer had given them a sign, saying,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 배신자가 그들에게 표징을 주며 말하되,

sentences.original_text: The one I will kiss is the man.
and lead him away under guard.
